profile.name: Reina
profile.title: Lightning Flash Reina
profile.story: Reina von Stein was born the daughter of a noble family of the empire. Her free spirit and energetic personality seem to brighten up even those around her. She prefers a life of freedom as a mercenary over the suffocating life of an aristocrat. After working as a mercenary for a long time, and she's already lost all traces of her noble upbringing in her manners. Even as a child, she showed a natural talent with swords. Over the years, she developed her skills with a rapier, using a style that best suited her lithe physique. Recently, she turned down a strange contract. Ever since then, she has been feeling as if someone has been following and watching her.

1.name: Float Like a Butterfly
1.description:
Quickly stabs the enemy, dealing [ffc800]277*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+160.5% ATK[-] as Physical DMG. On a Critical Hit, applies [fa96fa][Wound][-] [64ffff]1[-] stack and resets the cooldown. This skill’s DMG is increased by [64ff64]20%[-] per stack of [fa96fa][Wound][-].

[ffc800]Awakening Coefficient([-]★1 ~ 5[ffc800]): [[-] 1 / 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 / 8 [ffc800]][-]

2.name: Sharp End
2.description:
Removes harmful effects from self and increases ATK by [64ff64]205*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))[-] and Critical Hit Chance by [64ff64]500[-] for [64ffff]15sec[-].

[ffc800]Awakening Coefficient([-]★1 ~ 5[ffc800]): [[-] 1 / 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 / 8 [ffc800]][-]

3.name: Shooting Star
3.description:
Performs a series of attacks, dealing [ffc800]126*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))+72.3% ATK[-] Physical Damage [64ffff]9 times[-], then finishes with a powerful thrust that deals [ffc800]1132*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))651.5% ATK[-] Physical Damage and [fa96fa]knocks the enemy far away[-]. The damage of this skill is increased by [64ff64]20%[-] per [fa96fa][Wound][-] stack, and all [fa96fa][Wound][-] stacks are consumed on the final hit.

[ffc800]Awakening Coefficient([-]★1 ~ 5[ffc800]): [[-] 1 / 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 / 8 [ffc800]][-]

4.name: Lucky Child
4.description:
On a Critical Hit, increases ATK by [64ff64]40*(0.7+(0.3*Skill Level*Awakening Coefficient))[-] for [64ffff]10sec[-]. This effect stacks up to [64ffff]8[-] times.

[ffc800]Awakening Coefficient([-]★1 ~ 5[ffc800]): [[-] 1 / 2 / 3.5 / 5.5 / 8 [ffc800]][-]

4.IV: Increases DEF Penetration by [64ff64]250[-] for the duration of Skill.

light.effect: Mana cost is increased by 1000, but the maximum number of [Wound Stacks] is increased to 10.

dark.effect: Immune to status ailments while casting.
Mana cost is increased by 1000, but the Critical Hit Chance increase effect is replaced with an effect that increases Critical Damage by 65%, and damage dealt to bosses is increased by 30%.

light.effect: Each time a critical hit occurs, the damage of the last hit is increased by 10%.

dark.effect: Immune to all damage while casting.

light.effect: Damage dealt to non-hero enemies is increased by 4% per stack.

dark.effect: When using a skill, has a 10% chance to increase your Critical Damage by 7%. This effect stacks up to 10 times.

uw.name: Lightning Flash, Livatis
uw.description: Each time a Critical Hit occurs, for 15 sec own Attack Speed is increased by {0} and Critical Damage is increased by {1}%. This effect stacks up to 8 times.
uw.story: The Stein family boasts a long lineage that dates back to the early days of the empire. The honor of the family, however, stems from the skills of its warriors, not its noble bloodline. Aria Stein was a legendary master of the blade. Remembered as one of the most skilled warriors in the history of the empire, she laid the foundation of the Stein family honor. Reina is her descendant. Aria's sword, Livatis, currently belongs to Reina. Light as a feather yet strong enough to withstand any strike, this sword helped Reina earn the nickname 'Flash.'

1.name: Wing of Lightning Flash
1.description: [Float Like a Butterfly] Increases DMG by {0}%, and reduces the target's P.Block Chance by 500 for 10 sec.
1.story:
A pair of mystical Ear Cuffs that raise the wearer's speed to the limit.
Nyx gave it as a present to Reina, who kept telling him to open portals since she didn't care for the rigors of traveling. Reina wears this strange item in battle, and she looks like a pretty butterfly flying at lightning speed when she raises her sword.

2.name: Master's Ring
2.description: [Sharp End] Increases ATK Boost by 50% and recovers additional {0} MP upon a Crit Hit for the skill's duration.
2.story:
The ring that Reina received after defeating her master. It's too big, so she wears it on her thumb. 
It looks simple and ungainly, but the spirit of fighting is hidden within the rune letters engraved in the ring.
Staring at the ring of her master makes her feel like she will be getting more work today.

3.name: Medal of Swiftness
3.description: [Shooting Star] Increases DMG by {0}%, and adds 1 Wound per attack.
3.story: A honorable medal given to the fastest mercenary. It's said to be a keepsake from Hersz, the fastest warrior in the world. Wearing this medal will make the bearer's body feel lighter, and they'll be able to predict the opponent's movements.

4.name: Amethyst Pin
4.description: [Lucky Child] Increases the max number of stacks by 2, each stack increasing Crit DMG by {0}%.
4.story:
A pin that belongs to Reina's mother, a renowned leader of mercenaries in the Empire.
She gave this pin to her daughter when she left to Orvel Kingdom all alone, hoping it would cast bad luck away. It can also be used as a weapon in case of emergency.
